channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I Hate My AI Friend
item.description: The chatbot-enabled Friend necklace eavesdrops on your life and provides a running commentary that’s snarky and unhelpful. Worse, it can also make the...

item.title: Uber and Momenta to test autonomous vehicles in Germany in 2026
item.description: Momenta is one of 20 global AV partners that Uber has scooped up across its ridehail, delivery, and freight businesses. Uber says those partnerships h...

item.title: InDrive has big plans to become a global ‘super app’ where others have failed
item.description: InDrive plans to expand into multiple verticals over the next 12 months across its top markets, starting with grocery deliveries in Kazakhstan.

item.title: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds (2nd Gen): Excellent Buds
item.description: With slight, useful changes like wireless charging and better processing, these noise-canceling buds remain at the top of the pile.

item.title: How to Add WIRED as a Preferred Source on Google (2025)
item.description: The new Google Preferred Sources tool helps you see more of what you want in your search results.

item.title: Microsoft says Azure affected after cables cut in the Red Sea
item.description: It's not clear who cut the cables or why.

item.title: Psychological Tricks Can Get AI to Break the Rules
item.description: Researchers convinced large language model chatbots to comply with “forbidden” requests using a variety of conversational tactics.

item.title: Are bad incentives to blame for AI hallucinations?
item.description: How can a chatbot be so wrong — and sound so confident in its wrongness?

item.title: The New Math of Quantum Cryptography
item.description: In theory, quantum physics can bypass the hard mathematical problems at the root of modern encryption. A new proof shows how.

item.title: Koah raises $5M to bring ads into AI apps
item.description: One investor says Koah is "building the essential monetization layer for consumer AI."
